mapper.insert: insert into product_saleing(mem_seq, product_num, saleing_amount, saleing_addr, saleing_tel, saleing_date, saleing_option, saleing_option_state, saleing_group, saleing_delivery, delivery_message, saleing_name, product_delivery_state) values(#{mem_seq}, #{product_num}, #{saleing_amount}, #{saleing_addr}, #{saleing_tel}, sysdate(), 0, 0, #{saleing_group}, #{saleing_delivery}, #{delivery_message}, #{saleing_name}, 0)
mapper.select: select MAX(saleing_group) from saleing_groupseq where mem_seq = #{mem_seq}

select * from product_saleing where mem_seq = #{mem_seq} and saleing_group = ( select MAX(saleing_group) from product_saleing where mem_seq = #{mem_seq} ) and saleing_num = (select MAX(saleing_num) from product_saleing where mem_seq = #{mem_seq})
select saleing_group from product_saleing where mem_seq = #{mem_seq} group by saleing_group order by saleing_group desc

select p.product_name, p.product_code, p.product_brand, p.product_price, p.product_img , ps.saleing_group, ps.saleing_amount
from product_saleing ps , product p where ps.product_num = p.product_num and ps.saleing_group = #{saleing_group}
